TopicTitle: Powered landing - with a stock SFB

Articles.Content:
Alright, this is simple. Using stock parts, your goal is to loft a rocket past 2km altitude, then land it safely. You must use stock parts, and cannot actively slow your descent with anything other than solid fuel boosters (no liquids, no parachutes; winglets are okay).

Person with the least number of destroyed parts on landing wins. My current record is 2.

I did it with 0.

Just before landing:

Touched down. It was a bit wobbly but the 11 SASes kept it under control.

And yes, it does stand up with SAS turned off.

Nothing broken, but it looks like some of it came apart :/

Well, that was quick.

I guess the only way to improve on that is to land without BREAKING anything (as in structural failures, not explosions).
Clearly, this game is not hard enough for some of you. We need an 'expert rocketeer' pack that makes everything structurally weaker and makes the engines weaker!
